title: Teeth and Other Stories
description: Collection of short stories by J.R. Rain. Includes one featuring the characters from her Vampire For Hire series.J.R. Rain here. When I get email regarding my books, more often than not that mail consists of a single Who's Fang? Fang, for those of you who have not read my vampire mystery novel, MOON DANCE, is Samantha Moon's online confidant. Although I always suspected his role would expand in future books, little is explained about who Fang is or where he comes from. Well, consider his role expanded. At least for the time being. "Teeth" is his story. Or, rather, his backstory, in which the question is What happens when a child is born with a rare throwback gene, a gene that produces two exceptionally long teeth?Also included in the "My Father's Eyes" - Death comes to a small bar in Los Angeles...and orders a beer."The Fridge" - a man buying a state-of-the-art refrigerator gets much more than he bargained for."Die Spy" - a spy very much comes out of the cold."Step on a Crack" - an old curse gets a very real update.And a bonus short story from the novel, THE BODY "Two Ghosts", in which two lost souls find a way not to be so lost....
author: J.R. Rain
